game.name: Burger Time
game.description:
Among the girls online game category, the cooking games have become a craze among girls as they prefer them for many reasons and the most important one is due to inclination and preference towards cooking that is an inherent trait of girls and is their naturally gifted motivation towards the cooking.

The free online cooking game Burger Time, hence, is introduced here to tell the girls gamer how to cook game in a crazy some style and method.

In the burger time game, being an owner of a fast food joint you have to serve the best and yummy burger to the hungry customers. Make the dish according to their preference and choice. The recipe for the burger can be obtained from the help desk. You have to keep all the customers happy at any cost. Losing out any valuable customer will result only be a loss of business in this free online cooking game.

The type of burger that you offer out there in the game includes a simple burger, cheese burger, double cheese burger, and others. So, when a customer orders for a burger, carefully, look for he has ordered and then accordingly prepare the burger according to the recipes provided and serve it to the customer. And see, whether, you are appreciated or condemned out there.

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Burger Time at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Cooking games for best excitement and thrill in you!
